name: Ramsbottom Smith and the Quest for the Yellow Spheroid
overview: Ramsbottom Smith and The Quest For The Yellow Spheroid is a 2018 text adventure for the ZX Spectrum. It was developed by John Wilson and Gareth Pitchford, who converted the game to the C64 after the Spectrum version was finished. There are some difference, in that the Spectrum version has more colours, whereas the C64 conversion has just plain white text on a black background.
